main event: A military observer sighted a spheroid-shaped object that emitted a trail of white smoke in Gallup, New Mexico, on June 5, 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as being brilliant orange against a deep blue sky., The object was observed for only 5 seconds., The trail of smoke persisted for around 15 minutes after the sighting., The object was estimated to be approximately 50 miles away from the observer., The observer was a Captain with excellent character as mentioned in the report.
witness description: The observer is a Captain and a Post Engineer Officer in the military.
